SEARCH
Package research

Class Researcher

java.lang.Object
fromUser.User
research.Researcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
fromUser.UserInterface, Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<fromUser.User>
public class Researcher extends fromUser.User implements fromUser.UserInterface
The Researcher class represents a user with researcher privileges in the system. It extends the User class and implements the UserInterface.
See Also:

    • Researcher

      public Researcher(fromUser.User user) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructor for creating a Researcher based on an existing User.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object to be associated with the researcher.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the user is not a Student or Teacher.

    • Researcher

      Parameters:
      email - The email of the researcher.
      password - The password of the researcher.
      userType - The type of the user (Student or Teacher).
